title: Bring back enemy honours!!
body:
So as some of you may know, Riot has on one hand said saying GG EZ is reportable for being toxic and on the other hand encouraged it with their Facebook post meme saying GG EZ.

Riot need to bring back the 'Honour the Enemy' option.

Just had a game where the enemy stomped us, there was no 'GG EZ' from the enemy team just everyone saying GG all round, it was a nice change from most saying 'GG EZ'.

There are too many kids and dare I say immature adults saying 'GG EZ' these days so why not have an option to honour a team mate AND an enemy team player for good sportsmanship?

We all know LoL is known for being toxic, so encourage people to be less toxic and implement something like this again.

replies.body: You think Riot will EVER encourage positive behaviour? They don't even punish negative behaviours.
